thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Don Quijote Holdings to issue unsecured corporate bonds worth totaling 20 bln yen

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Don Quijote Holdings to issue unsecured corporate bonds worth totaling 20 bln yen

organizations.name: reuters) - don quijote holdings co ltd

text:
March 2 (Reuters) - Don Quijote Holdings Co Ltd
* Says it plans to issue 13th series unsecured corporate bonds worth 10 billion yen, with interest rate of 0.21 percent
* Says it plans to issue 14th series unsecured corporate bonds worth 10 billion yen, with interest rate of 0.48 percent
* Subscription date on March 2 and payment date on March 8
* Bonds will be used for loan repayment and equipment fund
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/H9jT2H
 (Beijing Headline News)
